verses.verse: It pleased <S%H6925><s%> Darius <S%H1868><s%> to set <S%H6966><s%> over <S%H5922><s%> the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> a hundred <S%H3969><s%> and twenty <S%H6243><s%> princes <S%H324><s%>, which should be <S%H1934><s%> over the whole <S%H3606><s%> kingdom <S%H4437><s%>;

And over <S%H5924><s%> these <S%H4481><s%> three <S%H8532><s%> presidents <S%H5632><s%>; of whom <S%H4481><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> was first <S%H2298><s%>: that <S%H459><s%> the princes <S%H324><s%> might <S%H1934><s%> give <S%H3052><s%> accounts <S%H2941><s%> unto them <S%H4430><s%>, and the king should have <S%H1934><s%> no <S%H3809><s%> damage <S%H5142><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> was <S%H1934><s%> preferred <S%H5330><s%> above <S%H5922><s%> the presidents <S%H5632><s%> and princes <S%H324><s%>, because <S%H3606><s%> a excellent <S%H3493><s%> spirit <S%H7308><s%> was in him <S%H4430><s%>; and the king thought <S%H6246><s%> to set <S%H6966><s%> him over <S%H5922><s%> the whole <S%H3606><s%> realm <S%H4437><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> the presidents <S%H5632><s%> and princes <S%H324><s%> sought <S%H1934><s%> to find <S%H7912><s%> occasion <S%H5931><s%> against Daniel <S%H1841><s%> concerning <S%H6655><s%> the kingdom <S%H4437><s%>; but <S%H3606><s%> they could <S%H3202><s%> find <S%H7912><s%> no <S%H3809><s%> occasion <S%H5931><s%> nor <S%H3809><s%> fault <S%H7844><s%>; forasmuch <S%H6903><s%> as he was faithful <S%H540><s%>, neither <S%H3809><s%> was there any <S%H3606><s%> error <S%H7960><s%> or fault <S%H7844><s%> found <S%H7912><s%> in him <S%H5922><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> said <S%H560><s%> these <S%H479><s%> men <S%H1400><s%>, We shall not <S%H3809><s%> find <S%H7912><s%> any <S%H3606><s%> occasion <S%H5931><s%> against <S%H5922><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%>, except <S%H3861><s%> we find <S%H7912><s%> it against him concerning the law <S%H1882><s%> of his God <S%H426><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> these <S%H459><s%> presidents <S%H5632><s%> and princes <S%H324><s%> assembled together <S%H7284><s%> to the king <S%H4430><s%>, and said <S%H560><s%> thus <S%H3652><s%> unto him <S%H5922><s%>, King <S%H4430><s%> Darius <S%H1868><s%>, live <S%H2418><s%> for ever <S%H5957><s%>.

All <S%H3606><s%> the presidents <S%H5632><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4437><s%>, the governors <S%H5460><s%>, and the princes <S%H324><s%>, the counselors <S%H1907><s%>, and the captains <S%H6347><s%>, have consulted together <S%H3272><s%> to establish <S%H6966><s%> a royal <S%H4430><s%> statute <S%H7010><s%>, and to make a firm <S%H8631><s%> decree <S%H633><s%>, that whoever shall ask <S%H1156><s%> a petition <S%H1159><s%> of <S%H4481><s%> any <S%H3606><s%> God <S%H426><s%> or man <S%H606><s%> for <S%H5705><s%> thirty <S%H8533><s%> days <S%H3118><s%>, save <S%H3861><s%> of you <S%H4481><s%>, O king <S%H4430><s%>, he shall be cast <S%H7412><s%> into the den <S%H1358><s%> of lions <S%H744><s%>.

Now <S%H3705><s%>, O king <S%H4430><s%>, establish <S%H6966><s%> the decree <S%H633><s%>, and sign <S%H7560><s%> the writing <S%H3792><s%>, that it be not <S%H3809><s%> changed <S%H8133><s%>, according to the law <S%H1882><s%> of the Medes <S%H4076><s%> and Persians <S%H6540><s%>, which alters <S%H5709><s%> not <S%H3809><s%>.
Therefore <S%H1836><s%> king <S%H4430><s%> Darius <S%H1868><s%> signed <S%H7560><s%> the writing <S%H3792><s%> and the decree <S%H633><s%>.

Now when Daniel <S%H1841><s%> knew <S%H3046><s%> that the writing <S%H3792><s%> was signed <S%H7560><s%>, he went <S%H5954><s%> into his house <S%H1005><s%>; and his windows <S%H3551><s%> being open <S%H6606><s%> in his chamber <S%H5952><s%> toward <S%H5049><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3390><s%>, he kneeled <S%H1289><s%> upon <S%H5922><s%> his knees <S%H1291><s%> three <S%H8532><s%> times <S%H2166><s%> a day <S%H3118><s%>, and prayed <S%H6739><s%>, and gave thanks <S%H3029><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> his God <S%H426><s%>, as <S%H6903><s%> he did <S%H1934><s%> before <S%H1836><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> these <S%H479><s%> men <S%H1400><s%> assembled <S%H7284><s%>, and found <S%H7912><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> praying <S%H1156><s%> and making supplication <S%H2604><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> his God <S%H426><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> they came near <S%H7127><s%>, and spoke <S%H560><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> concerning <S%H5922><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%>'s decree <S%H633><s%>; Have you not <S%H3809><s%> signed <S%H7560><s%> a decree <S%H633><s%>, that every <S%H3606><s%> man <S%H606><s%> that shall ask <S%H1156><s%> a petition of <S%H4481><s%> any <S%H3606><s%> God <S%H426><s%> or man <S%H606><s%> inside <S%H5705><s%> thirty <S%H8533><s%> days <S%H3118><s%>, save <S%H3861><s%> of you <S%H4481><s%>, O king <S%H4430><s%>, shall be cast <S%H7412><s%> into the den <S%H1358><s%> of lions <S%H744><s%>? The king <S%H4430><s%> answered <S%H6032><s%> and said <S%H560><s%>, The thing <S%H4406><s%> is true <S%H3330><s%>, according to the law <S%H1882><s%> of the Medes <S%H4076><s%> and Persians <S%H6540><s%>, which alters <S%H5709><s%> not <S%H3809><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> answered <S%H6032><s%> they and said <S%H560><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%>, That Daniel <S%H1841><s%>, which is of <S%H4481><s%> the sons <S%H1123><s%> of the captivity <S%H1547><s%> of Judah <S%H3061><s%>, regards <S%H7761><s%> not <S%H3809><s%> you <S%H5922><s%>, O king <S%H4430><s%>, nor the decree <S%H633><s%> that you have signed <S%H7560><s%>, but makes <S%H1156><s%> his petition <S%H1159><s%> three <S%H8532><s%> times <S%H2166><s%> a day <S%H3118><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%>, when he heard <S%H8086><s%> these words <S%H4406><s%>, was severely <S%H7690><s%> displeased <S%H888><s%> with himself <S%H7761><s%>, and set his heart <S%H1079><s%> on <S%H5922><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> to deliver <S%H7804><s%> him <S%H1934><s%>: and he labored until <S%H5705><s%> the going down <S%H4606><s%> of the sun <S%H8122><s%> to deliver him <S%H5338><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> these <S%H479><s%> men <S%H1400><s%> assembled <S%H7284><s%> unto <S%H5922><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%>, and said <S%H560><s%> unto the king <S%H4430><s%>, Know <S%H3046><s%>, O king <S%H4430><s%>, that the law <S%H1882><s%> of the Medes <S%H4076><s%> and Persians <S%H6540><s%> is <S%H3606><s%>, That no decree <S%H633><s%> nor statute <S%H7010><s%> which the king <S%H4430><s%> establishes <S%H6966><s%> may be changed <S%H8133><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> commanded <S%H560><s%>, and they brought <S%H858><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%>, and cast <S%H7412><s%> him into the den <S%H1358><s%> of lions <S%H744><s%>. Now the king <S%H4430><s%> spoke <S%H6032><s%> and said <S%H560><s%> unto Daniel <S%H1841><s%>, Your God <S%H426><s%> whom you <S%H607><s%> serve <S%H6399><s%> continually <S%H8411><s%>, he will deliver you <S%H7804><s%>.

And a <S%H2298><s%> stone <S%H69><s%> was brought <S%H858><s%>, and laid <S%H7761><s%> upon <S%H5922><s%> the mouth <S%H6433><s%> of the den <S%H1358><s%>; and the king <S%H4430><s%> sealed <S%H2857><s%> it with his own signet <S%H5824><s%>, and with the signet <S%H5824><s%> of his lords <S%H7261><s%>; that the purpose <S%H6640><s%> might not <S%H3809><s%> be changed <S%H8133><s%> concerning Daniel <S%H1841><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> went <S%H236><s%> to his palace <S%H1965><s%>, and passed the night <S%H956><s%> fasting <S%H2908><s%>: neither <S%H3809><s%> were instruments <S%H1761><s%> of music brought <S%H5954><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> him <S%H8139><s%>: and his sleep went <S%H5075><s%> from him <S%H5922><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> arose <S%H6966><s%> very early <S%H8238><s%> in the morning <S%H5053><s%>, and went <S%H236><s%> in haste <S%H927><s%> unto the den <S%H1358><s%> of lions <S%H744><s%>.

And when he came <S%H7127><s%> to the den <S%H1358><s%>, he cried <S%H2200><s%> with a lamentable <S%H6088><s%> voice <S%H7032><s%> unto Daniel <S%H1841><s%>: and the king <S%H4430><s%> spoke <S%H6032><s%> and said <S%H560><s%> to Daniel <S%H1841><s%>, O Daniel <S%H1841><s%>, servant <S%H5649><s%> of the living <S%H2417><s%> God <S%H426><s%>, is your God <S%H426><s%>, whom you serve <S%H6399><s%> continually <S%H8411><s%>, able <S%H3202><s%> to deliver <S%H7804><s%> you from <S%H4481><s%> the lions <S%H744><s%>?
Then <S%H116><s%> said <S%H4449><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> unto <S%H5974><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%>, O king <S%H4430><s%>, live <S%H2418><s%> for ever <S%H5957><s%>.

My God <S%H426><s%> has sent <S%H7972><s%> his angel <S%H4398><s%>, and has shut <S%H5463><s%> the lions <S%H744><s%>' mouths <S%H6433><s%>, that they have not <S%H3809><s%> hurt <S%H2255><s%> me <S%H3606><s%>: forasmuch as before <S%H6925><s%> him innocence <S%H2136><s%> was found <S%H7912><s%> in me <S%H638><s%>; and also before <S%H6925><s%> you <S%H4430><s%>, O king, have I done <S%H5648><s%> no <S%H3809><s%> hurt <S%H2248><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> was the king <S%H4430><s%> exceedingly <S%H7690><s%> glad <S%H2868><s%> for him <S%H5922><s%>, and commanded <S%H560><s%> that they should take <S%H5267><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> up <S%H5267><s%> out of <S%H4481><s%> the den <S%H1358><s%>. So Daniel <S%H1841><s%> was taken up <S%H5267><s%> out of <S%H4481><s%> the den <S%H1358><s%>, and no <S%H3809><s%> manner <S%H3606><s%> of hurt <S%H2257><s%> was found <S%H7912><s%> upon him <S%H540><s%>, because he believed in his God <S%H426><s%>.

And the king <S%H4430><s%> commanded <S%H560><s%>, and they brought <S%H858><s%> those <S%H479><s%> men <S%H1400><s%> which had accused <S%H399><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%>, and they cast <S%H7412><s%> them into the den <S%H1358><s%> of lions <S%H744><s%>, them <S%H581><s%>, their sons <S%H1123><s%>, and their wives <S%H5389><s%>; and the lions <S%H744><s%> had the mastery <S%H5705><s%> of them <S%H1855><s%>, and broke all <S%H3606><s%> their bones <S%H1635><s%> in pieces <S%H1855><s%> or ever <S%H3809><s%> they came <S%H4291><s%> at the bottom <S%H773><s%> of the den <S%H1358><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> king <S%H4430><s%> Darius <S%H1868><s%> wrote <S%H3790><s%> unto all <S%H3606><s%> people <S%H5972><s%>, nations <S%H524><s%>, and languages <S%H3961><s%>, that live <S%H1753><s%> in all <S%H3606><s%> the earth <S%H772><s%>; Peace <S%H8001><s%> be multiplied unto you <S%H7680><s%>.

I <S%H4481><s%> make <S%H7761><s%> a decree <S%H2942><s%>, That in every <S%H3606><s%> dominion <S%H7985><s%> of my kingdom <S%H4437><s%> men tremble <S%H1934><s%> and fear <S%H1763><s%> before <S%H4481><s%> the God <S%H426><s%> of Daniel <S%H1841><s%>: for he is the living <S%H2417><s%> God <S%H426><s%>, and steadfast <S%H7011><s%> for ever <S%H5957><s%>, and his kingdom <S%H4437><s%> that which shall not <S%H3809><s%> be destroyed <S%H2255><s%>, and his dominion <S%H7985><s%> shall be even unto <S%H5705><s%> the end <S%H5491><s%>.

He delivers <S%H7804><s%> and rescues <S%H5338><s%>, and he works <S%H5648><s%> signs <S%H852><s%> and wonders <S%H8540><s%> in heaven <S%H8065><s%> and in earth <S%H772><s%>, who has delivered <S%H7804><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> the power <S%H3028><s%> of the lions <S%H744><s%>.
So this <S%H1836><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> prospered <S%H6744><s%> in the reign <S%H4437><s%> of Darius <S%H1868><s%>, and in the reign <S%H4437><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3567><s%> the Persian <S%H6543><s%>.
